root.message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 3-7-3, translated into en
root.data:
This indicator reflects the global indicator “3.c.1: Health worker density and distribution”- Density and distribution of healthcare workers.

Global indicator for classification of healthcare workers by occupational category ISCO-08. In addition to the scope of Vietnam - doctors, pharmacists, nurses, the world also requires classification by dentist and data on the percentage of medical staff by sex. Vietnam has no gender disaggregation.
